content: But in terms of greenfield opportunities our emerging markets, we're seeing really nice growth, as I mentioned before, internationally in some of those emerging markets, like Latin America, like Southeast Asia, and then also the big wins like I had mentioned in previously on the call with Kimberly Clark, which is a multi-year, multi-media million dollar, when that was a direct jump ball, doing deep tech diligence us against our competitors and winning fortune 500 brands.
